readable.content: A woman and child sitting on a bench beside a wooden bear carving . A woman and little girl are sitting on a wooden bench beside a wooden bear . A woman holds a little girl next to a large wooden carving of a bear . A woman with a young girl pose with bear statues in front of a store . A young girl being held by an older woman wearing bluejeans sitting on the lap of a bear statue near the entrance to a wooden building .
